Description:
Great Starter Home or Ideal Investment!
Only 4 years young this well-presented family home is sure to impress Located within close proximity of all amenities, only minutes away from Shopping on Clyde, Casey Race, Pasadena Park, Medical Centre, Bus Stops and Schooling is this great opportunity for a first home buyer, downsizer or astute investor looking for a guaranteed secure rental return with a happy tenant willing to extend their lease.
From the moment you walk in you will feel at home, welcoming you to the modern, open plan living consisting of a formal living area, the hostess kitchen with walk-in pantry, good fridge space and breakfast bar overlooking the meals area. Comprising of three bedrooms, the master bedroom with full-ensuite and walk-in robe. Other bedrooms with built-in robes and central to the main bathroom, toilet and laundry.
Further comforts of this home are ducted heating and evaporative cooling, a single remote garage with the security benefit of internal access. Make your way outdoors to the lovely alfresco area, ideal for entertaining guests amongst the backyard with plenty of room for the kids to run around in.
Young in age with the convenience of a central locality, this is a fantastic opportunity not to be missed!
Insights: 23 Green Gully Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Claim Your Castle!
This is your opportunity to secure a sophisticated double storey family home, and a rare chance to become a part of this fast-growing Community! This 27 square (approx) home is suitable for both the growing and established family. On the ground floor you will find the spacious living, dining and kitchen area purposely built for the family chef which includes a 900mm oven, walk-in pantry and a stone benchtop with waterfall edges. Open up the entire space with the large sliding doors leading onto the outdoor area and backyard with plenty of space to entertain family and friends. Downstairs you will also find a powder room, a large laundry and a sizeable double remote-control garage.
The home comprises of 4 sizeable bedrooms of which 3 provide built in wardrobes and the master with a spacious walk in robe and high quality ensuite. The first level also contains a large living area perfect for movie nights with the family & a bathroom central to all 4 bedrooms.
A short drive to Shopping On Clyde, St Peters College and many developments still to come in the local area, get in while you can! These developments include a proposed shopping centre, child care centre, sports and recreation facility, primary school and train station, Clyde is slowly becoming the place to be!
Insights: 10 Kenyan Avenue, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
North facing elevated creek side living
This block of land is titled and readily available to build your dream home in the much sought after Edgebrook Estate featuring
- 14m Frontage and 32m depth
- Land size of approx. 450 m2
- North facing premium flat land
- Front fence is included
- Close to shops, freeways & schools.
- Westfield shopping centre & Clyde railway station is coming soon
Edgebrook estate is a great pocket with all facilities at your doorstep.
Schools, shopping, sports facilities and playground all within close proximity of your new home.
Just 40 minutes' drive to Melbourne CBD, this block has easy access to the East Link, Monash, Princess and Western Port Highway.
Close to Light house Christian College, Cranbourne Primary School, Cranbourne Secondary School, Cranbourne Grammar School, Monash University & Chisholm TAFE, Cranbourne Park & Fountain gate shopping centre, Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf clubs & Cranbourne Swimming pool.
Contact Charles Raj for more information!

Description:
Titled land... No Easement...
Land for sale in Edgebrook Estate!
Featuring:
• Approx. 329m2
• Frontage approx. 13.5m (factoring in any set back)
• Corner Allotment
• No easements
• Walk to Clyde Creek
• Walk to future Central Park
Short proximity to:
• Willandra Rise & Clyde Primary Schools
• Clyde & Selandra Rise Shopping centre
• Minutes to St.Peters College and childcares
• Many recreational and sporting facilities such as Casey Race, Cranbourne Racecourse, Casey Fields Tennis Courts
• Purposed Ramlegh Village Shopping centre
• Purposed primary school
• Purposed Sports Precinct (sports grounds & ovals)
With shortage of quality and affordable blocks in today's market, this rare opportunity won't last long.
Don't delay and call Yogi Patel - 0451 719 161 to discuss further.
**Photos are for illustration purpose only

Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS! TOP LOCATION!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au

Description:
Perfect family living
This well-appointed three Bedroom residence superbly combines functional family living alongside exquisite entertaining spaces. Built to an exceptional standard, and showcasing premium quality inclusions throughout, which include.
- Ducted Heating w/ Spilt System Cooling
- Hardwood Floors
- Stone Benchtops
- Security cameras
- Downlights
- Built in robes, Master with a walk in robe
- 900mm stainless appliances
it is certain to delight those seeking the complete package in a quality location. Entertaining all year round is sure to be a breeze given the large undercover alfresco area which adjoins a low maintenance rear yard, perfect for children to enjoy. A double lock up garage, Located only moments from Public Transport, Clyde Shopping Centre , Wallandra Primary School, Casey Grammar School & Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.
This stand out home will not to disappoint you and will impress your family and friends on any occasion. Please contact me today to view this beautiful home.

Description:
A Real Hidden Gem
Welcome to one of Clyde's most picturesque and sought-after estates. Situated in a quiet corner of the Pasadena Estate, this low maintenance 3 bedroom property is brimming with exceptional features and is ready for you to move right in and enjoy! You'll be impressed with what this property has to offer including:
- Three generously sized bedrooms
- Quality fittings throughout
- Open plan sun-bathed dining and living area
- Modern kitchen and central bathroom
- Evaporative cooling and Ducted Heating throughout
- Alfresco Area, perfect for all year round entertaining
- A low maintenance gardens
- Single car garage with internal access
- Plus much more...
All this value makes it the perfect property, ready for you to move in and enjoy, or a great inclusion into your rental portfolio. Being close to all Clyde has to offer including Shopping Centres, Primary & Secondary schools, Child cares centres and lots of parks to play. Many fantastic schools are within walking distance or a short drive away, and great access to Casey fields sporting complete, Casey Race swimming centre, Casey Sports stadium, public transport and the Monash Freeway. For more information on this beautiful property, Call Paul May.
Photo Identification is required at all Open Homes
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our business development department has appraised this property at $350-$360p/w ($1,521-$1,564pcm) for more details about leasing contact our office on 03 9705 3000 today.
** Arranging an Inspection is easy! Please refer to the instructions below to book your inspection online**
**To book an appointment to view this property, please click on the "Book an inspection" button and register your details and we will instantly respond to you with available inspection times. You MUST register or the appointment time may not go ahead. If no appointment time is available, please register and we will notify you as soon as a time becomes available. **

Description:
Picture Perfect
Welcome to 56 Chesney Circuit situated in the much sought after Belmond on Clyde estate. Only 1 year young this immaculately presented Metricon home with an abundance of upgrades will delight first home buyers, downsizers and investors.
Offering:
* Large entry with beautiful flowing floor boards
* Three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite including double vanity
* Remaining bedrooms all include built in robes
* Open plan lounge room and dining area
* Modern kitchen, featuring; stone bench tops, subway tiles, 900mm oven & gas cooktop, 900mm rangehood & stainless steel dishwasher
* Ducted heating
* Modern ceiling fans throughout
* European shutters and blinds
* Double garage with internal access and remote control door
* Amazing timber deck ideal for the summer evenings
* Low maintenance backyard
* Quality fixtures and fittings
Belmond is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. Lush parks, open spaces , easy access to Shopping on Clyde, Primary Schools, sports and recreation facilities its got it all!
Dont miss this opportunity Inspect today!!

5 Acres of Premium Land in an Approved Clyde Creek PSP
An excellent opportunity to secure this property in an approved Clyde Creek PSP and forms part of Major Clyde Town Centre. Surrounded by fastest selling estates Edgebrook, Eliston and Hartleigh, it is definitely a great investment for investors, land bankers and developers who may be interested in commercial project.
Existing house comprises:
* Spacious 4 bedrooms
* Formal lounge
* Functional Kitchen
* Central bathroom
* Separate laundry
Other features include, gas heater, timber floors and sun room and massive shed/garage.
For all enquiries, Please call Manpreet Dandiwal 0433413927 or Anand Jain 0421406206.

Description:
Perfect first home or investment!
The contemporary touches, attention to detail and smart design of this home make it a great investment to add to the portfolio, as a first home or as a downsizer.
The designer kitchen has all the mod cons your family needs with quality stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher, a large pantry and gas cooking. As well as features like beautiful wood grain cabinets, white counter tops and a breakfast bar.
The open floor plan of the kitchen/dining/living area along with the large windows and sliding door give this space a light and airy feel.
The master bedroom is spacious and with a modern en suite including a large vanity and glass shower. The additional bedrooms are light and airy with large windows, BIR's and carpeted floors.
The family bathroom is beautifully finished with quality fittings, a large bath and separate glass shower. A dark wood grain vanity is the stand out feature of the space.
A beautifully landscaped garden with a shed, and an expansive roofed courtyard ideal for BBQ's, complete the property.
Main features include:
- Expansive courtyard perfect for BBQs year-round
- Open-plan kitchen/living/dining
- Three inviting bedrooms with BIR's
- Two finished beautifully bathrooms
- Durable carpet and tiling throughout
- Feature lighting and central heating around the home
- Beautifully landscaped garden with shed
- Remote-controlled garage with internal access
It's close proximity to Casey Fields Sports Centre, several parks and schools, as well as other amenities make life easy. Jump onto the M1 or the train at Cranbourne Station for a laid-back commute to Melbourne.
Don't delay, book an inspection with our team today!

Description:
COMPACT HOUSE DESIGN WITH CHARMING FEATURES
House with astute compact design but with appealing features; this four bedroom home, built 6 months ago is situated at Edgebrook Estate in Clyde, is sure amazing.
This 20sq home designed for contemporary style families with master bedroom including ensuite and WIR's, kitchen, Dining/family room just the place for the family to come together. Additional three bedrooms, all with BIR's and Theatre room for entertainment and more.
Situated in Melbourne's growing south-east region, Edgebrook is your place for peace and comfort while everything you need is a short drive away and where community spirit will thrive and come to life with a carefully designed master-plan and future central park focused on bringing the community together.
The local amenities offered are Clyde Shopping Centre while further down the road is Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and the Casey Indoor Sports Centre, Gym, Library and nearby schools within 5 minutes drive.
This home is packed with features, including:
Master bedroom features a walk-in-robe and ensuite
Another three bedrooms, all with built-in-robes
Plus the theatre/rumpus room comes with double doors so can be used as a bed room.
Living area conveniently positioned adjacent to kitchen and dining.
Modern kitchen features a 40mm stone island benchtop, 900mm cooker and oven, dishwasher, shiny splashback, and ample storage cabinets for pantry etc.
Ensuite and common Bathroom with double vanity, stone benchtop, and shower enclosure.
Separate common toilet and sperate Laundry with ample storage and linen cabinets.
Low maintenance Landscaping, fencing and exposed aggregate driveways with concrete surrounding the house
Remote controlled double carpark lock up garage with internal access
> Ducted heating and Cooling
High Ceiling with LED downlights throughout the house
Window blinds
For more information, please contact your friendly sales team from Melvic Real Estate ;
Niel Gonsalves 0469708234
OR
Sonal Grover - 0435309310
MEET YOU DURING THE SCHEDULED OPENS FOR HOUSE INSPECTIONS OR CALL US TO BOOK FOR A PRIVATE INSPECTION AS PER YOUR CONVENIENCE
Note: Photo ID required during house inspections.
Disclaimer: Floor plans, photos are for representational purposes only and should be used as such; we accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained within.

Description:
Brand New House!! Built by "SHERRIDON HOMES"
Brand new 28Sq House Built by SHERRIDON HOMES!
Wise Group Real-Estate proudly presents this immaculate and spacious Brand New home that provides ultimate open plan family living areas within its highly sort-out plan. The design takes full advantage of the land size and offers multiple living areas and large bedrooms without compromising on your backyard space.
This brand new luxurious home offers 4 bedrooms plus study, 2 bathrooms, 2 toilets, master bedroom with full ensuite with 2 vanity units and other bedrooms with BIR, and an outdoor alfresco for the extended living on warm sunny weekends.
Inclusive of following additions:
- Modern kitchen with Caesar stone, plenty of spacious cupboards,
- 900 mm stainless steel appliances,
- Gas cook top with oven and range hood and a dishwasher.
- High ceilings,
- Ducted heating throughout,
- Evaporative cooling
- 3 living Areas
Extra complementing features such as a double lock up garage with remote access, low maintenance landscape garden, roller blinds, fly screens, fully fenced, 3 months maintenance warranty and down-light throughout. This is sure to impress you and tick all your boxes.
Located in prestigious Hartleigh estate, you will call home where:
- Clyde shopping Westfield future centre
- future railway station
- Selandra rise shopping center
- Casey fields
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- Selandra rise primary
- St Peters Secondary,
is just a short drive away.
Call Larry on 0497 770 666 today to make your very own appointment in order to inspect the property!

Description:
Outdoor living all year round
Create special memories any time of the year in this spectacular 4 bedroom plus study, 2 bathroom family home located on a 630m2 block.
The highlight of this home is the enormous alfresco dining area that has everything you could need for year-round family dinners or entertaining guests. You'll feel like you're outside with large sliding doors along most walls, bringing light and air into the space.
The contemporary kitchen includes design features such as an eye-catching splash back, a butler's pantry with fridge space and sink, a large breakfast bar and matte black sink tap, with premium appliances including a dishwasher.
The home theatre room is the ideal space for family movie nights, and a formal lounge complete with a fireplace is great for relaxing with friends.
The master bedroom includes plush carpeted floors, an expansive WIR and an en suite with a shower that's to die for, as well as his and hers vessel sinks.
Main features include:
- Huge alfresco dining area with expansive sliding doors
- Home theatre room
- Private study or home office space
- Formal lounge with feature fireplace
- Two indulgent bathrooms with powder room and laundry
- Modern light fittings throughout
- Central heating, split units and ceiling fans provide temperature control
- Beautifully landscaped garden
- Large storage room attached to garage
- Double remote-controlled garage with internal access
Hop onto the M1 into Melbourne or jump onto the train at Cranbourne Station. With a park across the road and other amenities like schools and shopping centres within a short distance, this home is the right choice.
Don't miss out on this rare opportunity, book an inspection with our team today!

Description:
Side Yard Access with Ability to Store a Truck, Caravan or Boat
Looking for that extra space for your cars, tools and expensive toys? Look no further; this unique property will tick all the boxes. With a stunning street appeal, complemented by its appealing neutral colour palette, this practical and stylish home will cater to your every need.
Set on a 512m2 block, this property boasts four generous sized bedrooms and two living areas. The master bedroom features a walk-in robe, full en-suite with double vanities and oversized shower bound to impress all who view it. The other three bedrooms with built in robes are located at the rear of the home with easy access to the main bathroom with shower, bath and a separate toilet. Consisting of 2 distinct living zones flowing together with the gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, loads of storage space and a brilliant walk in pantry finished with a modern splashback.
Also, this property offers side access with double door gates to accommodate for a truck, boat or caravan all perfect for a buyer that needs space. Providing additional living and entertaining space, the alfresco is accessed via the meals/ living area and provides the perfect spot for hosting family parties and weekend barbeques. The home is also complimented by a good-sized yard and remote-controlled double garage.
A home of this calibre that ticks all the boxes is sure to suit most buyers and investors so get in quick!
Features include:
- Gas ducted heating
- Evaporate Cooling
- Window furnishing
- Downlights
- 2 Living Areas
- Landscaped gardens
- Double garage with remote controlled roller door with internal access
- Side Yard Access
Privacy: Your entry to this property provides consent to the collection and use of personal information for security purposes. It may also be used to provide you with further information about the property, other properties and services marketed by Eview Group | Casey Estate Agents. Description:
BRAND NEW! LUXURIOUS! MOVE IN NOW !!
You will love to come home to this contemporary & luxurious home with its high ceilings, accommodating floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere. The focal point of this residence is its open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space, which all flow together effortlessly onto the Backyard area. You will not only be investing on this distinguished location, but also a flawless, and pristine design.
The kitchen becomes the masterpiece of the home, a with stainless steel cooktop, oven, dishwasher, stone bench tops and ample storage space for a modern family, on top of all if that your life is made much easier with a walk-in pantry with heaps of space and more to spare!
This home is brimming with features, including:
Four bedrooms, all with built in robes plus the third bedroom that comes with double doors so can be used as a theatre.
Master bedroom features a walk-in robe and ensuite with double vanity, stone benchtop, and large shower
Two separate living areas conveniently positioned around the home include a middle formal living, family room adjacent to kitchen and dining.
The modern kitchen features 40mm stone island benchtop, 900mm upright cooker and oven, dishwasher, clear glass splashback, and walk-in-pantry
Zoned ducted heating and evaporative cooling, and LED downlights throughout living areas
Driveways all included
Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
Offering easy access to a range of conveniences including,
- Future shopping center
- Bus stops
- Casey Fields
- St. Thomas the Apostle Primary School
- Selandra Rise Primary School
- St. Peters Secondary School
- Clyde shopping center
- Selandra Rise Shopping Centre
- Future railway station
SO DON'T miss out, contact Shan on 0416 891 662 Or Sam on 0421 696 470 to schedule a private inspection of this property.
"We have obtained all information in this listing from sources that we believe to be highly reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations."
*Images are for illustration purposes only*

Description:
Stylish, Single-level Retreat Opposite Parklands!
Stylish spaces and a quiet parkland position form an ideal combination for first home seekers, investors or downsizers in this modern single-level home. Warm, inviting and perfectly presented, contemporary interiors reveal a formal lounge, sleek kitchen with stainless steel appliances and bright family/meals area. 3 comfortable bedrooms are all appointed with BIRS (main with ensuite), whilst a central bathroom, ducted heating, split system AC, rear courtyard and single garage with internal access enhance lifestyle appeal. Beautifully located in the Belmond Estate opposite parklands, close to Cranbourne and Berwick Shopping Centres, Westfield Fountain Gate, Casey Fields. Schools and Monash University (Berwick Campus).
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.

Description:
SOLD BY CHAMINDA GUNASEKARA
CLYDE: Less than a month old, this impressive family home is positioned on a generous 448 square meters of land and offers an enviable lifestyle for any family.
Edgebrook is situated approximately 5 minutes away from two shopping centres with supermarkets and specialty stores. There are proposed creek-front walkways and bike ways within the community which will support active lifestyles.
With a large open plan living zone on offer, you will be provided with plenty of natural sunlight and space for your family. Not to forget the second separate living area. The ornate kitchen provides you with quality stainless appliances, a large island stone benchtop with a breakfast bar and a spacious butler's pantry.
The property itself features a free flowing; open floor plan sure to be enjoyed by all!
Added internal and external features include;
*Approximately 448 sqm land
*Built in 2019
*Upgraded facade
*Two separate living zones
*LED downlights
*Fully Landscaped gardens
*Evaporative cooling with touch screen controller
*Ducted heating
*Stone benches throughout
*Tiled splash back
*Artusi Dishwasher
*Artusi 900 mm five burner gas cook top & oven
*Butler's pantry
*Two vanities within en suite
*Separate toilet in en suite
*Alfresco
*Artificial grass in the backyard
*Feature wall
*Aesthetic bulkhead in the master bedroom and kitchen
*Double car garage
- Hillcrest Christian College is approximately fifteen minutes' drive away from the house
- Cranbourne Primary School is approximately ten minutes' drive away from the house
- Shopping on Clyde is approximately six minutes' drive away from the house
- Selandra Rise Shopping Centre is approximately seven minutes' drive away from the house
- Casey Fields is approximately nine minutes' drive away from the house
** PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS**
**Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans*

Description:
Living in an abundance of joy
This beautifully designed two-year-old Fairhaven open plan living home is positioned in the ever so popular growing Eliston Estate and is sure to impress.
This home features;
- Four spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite and remaining bedrooms with built in full mirrored robes.
- A large open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances, ceaser stone bench tops, clear glass splash back with ample amount of cupboard space overlooks the family/ meals area with a separate front living room at the front of the house.
- Double car garage with internal, external and remote access.
Other features include, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, carpet in all bedrooms and front living room, LED downlights, security system with cameras, a low maintenance backyard and an 18-panel solar system, you'll be sure to keep the cost of living down. With local parks including sporting fields (Casey Fields), Casey Race, schools, public transport and shops all close by and to top it off the amazing Elm Park within 20 steps from the driveway.
Eliston Estate is planned with perfection with soon having its own major town centre with shops and cafes, a new primary school and childcare centre within an arm's reach.
